SELECT t1.* FROM sys_menu t1 where t1.enabled=1 and t1.visible=1
and t1.mobile=#{isMobile} and t1.mobile_href is not null
and t1.id in
#{item}
SELECT t1.* FROM sys_menu t1 where t1.enabled=1 and t1.id not in (select DISTINCT menu_id from sys_permission)
SELECT t1.* FROM sys_menu t1 where t1.enabled=1 and t1.id in (select DISTINCT menu_id from sys_permission)

SELECT DISTINCT t1.* FROM sys_menu t1,sys_menu_category t2,sys_backend_module t3,hr_position_module t4 WHERE t1.enabled=1 AND t1.menu_category_id = t2.id AND t2.backend_module_id = t3.id AND t3.id=t4.backend_module_id and t4.position_id=#{positionId}
